title: Saudi Arabia announces revised school timings for Ramadan across regions
summary_full: Saudi Arabian education authorities have adjusted school schedules for Ramadan, with most morning classes starting between 9 a.m. and 10 a.m. Continuing and adult education programs will shift to evening hours. These changes aim to support fasting students and staff while maintaining academic standards and administrative efficiency.
